Name: Basic Attack
Description: Default melee attack.

Name: Weaken
Description: Target does 30% less damage over the next 4 seconds.

Name: Single Target Melee
Description: Default attack + dmg mod

Name: Single Target Ranged
Description: Default ranged attack.

Name: Melee Cleave
Description: Melee hits 2 characters.

Name: Cleave Ranged
Description: Hits 2 characters from afar.

Name: Poison/DoT
Description: Periodically does damage.

Name: Heal
Description: Periodically increases an ally's health. Channelled over 4 seconds.

Name: Shield
Description: Shields a single ally from damage.

Name: Sacrifice/Guard
Description: Shares 50% of all damage taken by an ally.

Name: Buff
Description: Increases an ally's attribute.

Name: Debuff
Description: Weakens an opponent during the duration.

Name: Interrupt
Description: Interrupts an opponents channelled ability.

Name: Silence
Description: Prevents target from casting spells for 3 seconds. Can also interrupt.

Name: Confuse
Description: Target can't identify friend from foe for 3 seconds.

Name: Demoralize
Description: Target receives 30% more damage over the next 3 seconds.

Name: Rampage
Description: An ally receives a 40% attack speed increase for the next 4 seconds.

Name: Flurry
Description: Character does 4 attacks in quick succession.

Name: Reflect
Description: Character reflects all attacks against him over the next 3 seconds.

Name: Esuna/Cleanse
Description: Removes an ally's Poison/DoT. Channelled over 4 seconds.

Name: GenericAbility
Description: This is a generic ability
